page.title: 01POPULATION
page.content:
In the area covered the population has doubled over the last fifty years, most of this as a result of the urban expansion which has occured in the last twenty years. The population increases dramatically during the summer months due to an influx of holidaymakers and day-tripping tourists who stay in the wide variety of holiday accommodation available.
There is an imbalanced age structure in the area. There is a large section of the population who are of retirement age, and, therefore correspondingly fewer numbers in other sections of the community, which creates a number of effects on other aspects of the society.
Much of the new urban development
